{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Packages"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "import tensorflow as tf\n",
    "from tensorflow import keras\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "from sklearn.metrics import confusion_matrix\n",
    "from sklearn.metrics import classification_report"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Importing Data"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "x_train :  (60000, 28, 28)\n",
      "y_train :  (60000,)\n",
      "x_test  :  (10000, 28, 28)\n",
      "y_test  :  (10000,)\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "(x_train, y_train), (x_test, y_test) = keras.datasets.mnist.load_data()\n",
    "\n",
    "print(\"x_train : \",x_train.shape)\n",
    "print(\"y_train : \",y_train.shape)\n",
    "print(\"x_test  : \",x_test.shape)\n",
    "print(\"y_test  : \",y_test.shape)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Data Normalization"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "xmax=x_train.max()\n",
    "x_train = x_train / xmax\n",
    "x_test  = x_test  / xmax"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Some examples"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "<matplotlib.image.AxesImage at 0x1d75f658d90>"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 4,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    },
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 432x288 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {
      "needs_background": "light"
     },
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plt.imshow(x_train[8])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/plain": [
       "0"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 5,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "y_train[1]"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Building model\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "hidden1     = 100\n",
    "hidden2     = 100\n",
    "\n",
    "model = keras.Sequential([\n",
    "    keras.layers.Input((28,28)),\n",
    "    keras.layers.Flatten(),\n",
    "    keras.layers.Dense( hidden1, activation='relu'),\n",
    "    keras.layers.Dense( hidden2, activation='relu'),\n",
    "    keras.layers.Dense( 10,      activation='softmax')\n",
    "])\n",
    "\n",
    "model.compile(optimizer='adam',\n",
    "              loss='sparse_categorical_crossentropy',\n",
    "              metrics=['accuracy'])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Train the model"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [

      "Epoch 8/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0626 - accuracy: 0.9820 - val_loss: 0.0849 - val_accuracy: 0.9736\n",

      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0544 - accuracy: 0.9842 - val_loss: 0.0837 - val_accuracy: 0.9748\n",
      "Epoch 10/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0489 - accuracy: 0.9861 - val_loss: 0.0778 - val_accuracy: 0.9758\n",
      "Epoch 11/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0419 - accuracy: 0.9885 - val_loss: 0.0761 - val_accuracy: 0.9764\n",
      "Epoch 12/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0380 - accuracy: 0.9899 - val_loss: 0.0732 - val_accuracy: 0.9778\n",
      "Epoch 13/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0342 - accuracy: 0.9908 - val_loss: 0.0772 - val_accuracy: 0.9764\n",
      "Epoch 14/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - ETA: 0s - loss: 0.0276 - accuracy: 0.99 - 1s 6ms/step - loss: 0.0278 - accuracy: 0.9929 - val_loss: 0.0745 - val_accuracy: 0.9778\n",
      "Epoch 15/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 5ms/step - loss: 0.0266 - accuracy: 0.9930 - val_loss: 0.0730 - val_accuracy: 0.9777\n",
      "Epoch 16/16\n",
      "118/118 [==============================] - 1s 5ms/step - loss: 0.0235 - accuracy: 0.9938 - val_loss: 0.0772 - val_accuracy: 0.9781\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "batch_size  = 512\n",
    "epochs      =  16\n",
    "\n",
    "history = model.fit(  x_train, y_train,\n",
    "                      batch_size      = batch_size,\n",
    "                      epochs          = epochs,\n",
    "                      verbose         = 1,\n",
    "                      validation_data = (x_test, y_test))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Evaluation of the model\n"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Test loss     : 0.07722221314907074\n",
      "Test accuracy : 0.9781000018119812\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "score = model.evaluate(x_test, y_test, verbose=0)\n",
    "\n",
    "print('Test loss     :', score[0])\n",
    "print('Test accuracy :', score[1])"
   ]
  },

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Performance Analysis"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "y_sigmoid = model.predict(x_test)\n",
    "y_pred    = np.argmax(y_sigmoid, axis=-1)"
   ]

   "source": [
